entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 16.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 late in the afternoon. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
